please shut up

Uno de mis videojuegos favoritos, sin embargo no lo puedo recomendar, debido a 3 cosas.

Los bugs, la comunidad y los devs son una cagada.

Deberían renombrarlo a Dead By Bug, porque la mitad de lo que juegues serán puros bugs, malas hitboxes (hachas que vuelan 3 metros sobre tu cabeza pero igualmente te dió).

La comunidad, tema delicado, pero sinceramente la de este juego es una mierda con diamantes incrustados.

Simplemente, los camperos y tunneleros que son unos chavales que se pican a la mínima que los loopees, tienes asegurado tu face-camp, y como asesino supervivientes que hacen Gen-Rush ( que es muy jodido, pobres killers), se ponen a putearte con las linternas, y no hablar de los egocéntricos que hacen todo el rato ruido aposta para que los sigas porque piensan que nunca los vas a pillar.
Y advertencia, cuidado con pillarlos, que se suicidarán y después te van a dejar bonitos mensajes en el muro del perfil, incluso algunos a acosarte pasándose de vez en cuando para dejarte tu -rep "inserte camper, tunneler, ect y un insulto random).
En conclusión, la mayoría de la gente de este juego son unos imbéciles tóxicos que no dejan disfrutar del juego.

Y la guinda del pastel, los putos devs.
Gente que cada vez que sacan un parche para arreglar bugs agregan 700 extras, gente que les importa más sacarle la pasta a la gente con las putas skins en vez de solucionar cosas más importantes (lag en consolas, hitboxes, problemas de balanceo (Ambos bandos tienen habilidades muy OP), Gen-Rush, que la gente se desconecte a cada rato, ect ect ect...

Siendo un juego con tanto potencial, y creo que está mal aprovechado...

Mi conclusión es que si quieres jugar a esto y pasártelo bien, juega con amigos, de lo contrario es muy frustrante (en mi experiencia, porque yo busco jugar bien a la par que me lo paso bien) cuando juegas solo por lo que he comentado anteriormente.

Ect. Y sí me lo preguntas sí, como mínimo un quinto de la comunidad de este juego tiene la inteligencia justa para no cagarse encima.

This is an open apology to the Devs.
I've been pretty heated on the forums, which resulted in a permanent ban. That's fine, but I just wanted to say, as one of your more bitter and jaded players (boon totems are still boring af) I just wanted to say great job on your most recent measures at balancing the game. It's genuinely fun again. I'm not sure if it's 80 hours a week fun like it was, but, it's fun. Thanks. I'm sorry I was a jerk.
its a pretty good game i enjoy being the killer
Its good

This game is so fucking flawed it's insane.

survivors move only a fraction slower than the killer which makes it nearly impossible to catch them when they can vault windows in less than a second, run around pallets and then stun you, have invulnerability and speed boost for a second, and a bunch of other bullshit. 

Queue times for survivor are horrendous when nobody wants to play killer due to the obvious imbalances. Why play killer when the 4 survivors are in a voice chat planning every single move, and even when you catch them you get blinded anyways losing all progress. Long queue times result in matchmaking doing absolutely nothing. Rank 20 killers can be put against rank 1-5 survivors all working together with maxed out tool boxes which make the only task survivors have even shorter.

The game is so f*cking survivor balanced that the devs don't even try to hide it anymore. Every single time a killer is somewhat decent they nerf it into the ground then just to impress the survivor playerbase (80% of the community or so) they add some bullsh*t perk that gives them yet another second chance or to bully the killer even harder. Not to mention nearly every killer, survivor, perk etc. is behind a paywall. Then when you pay that paywall you have to spend another 8 hours grinding to get them to level 40 which lets their perks be unlocked to all other characters. 

It's a grindfest with nearly 0 balance, sh*tty devs that don't play their own god damn game, $100+ dollars to unlock all killers and survivors on top of A SINGLE OUTFIT COSTING $10 IN REAL LIFE DOLLARS!

Please for all that is holy stay away from this game.


Edit 9/4/21: Game still sucks, cosmetics still cost a small fortune, devs still give zero shits on player engagement.

Edit 1/15/2022: Game is getting increasingly horrendous with lack of creative ideas driving uninspired killers and pointless cosmetics. Made player portraits look like plastic, made playing killer even more unrewarding with boon totems. I've never seen a game company more intrigued with driving players away instead of reeling them in.
